name: Aerin Stormbringer
backStory: Aerin Stormbringer, a young Elf born under the light of a shooting star, was destined for greatness. Gifted with an innate connection to the elements, Aerin's magical abilities surpassed those of his peers from a young age. As a Guardian of the Sacred Grove, Aerin is entrusted with the protection of the ancient forest where the oldest magic in Mystic Haven dwells. With the looming darkness threatening to engulf the land, Aerin must harness his powers and embark on a perilous journey to restore balance and harmony to his beloved realm.
